# reportPushToTalkMessage(userInfo:)

**Instance Method**

Informs the manager about a push-to-talk message on the connection.

## Declaration

```swift
func reportPushToTalkMessage(userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any] = [:])
```

## Parameters

- **userInfo**: A dictionary of custom information associated with the push-to -talk message, such as the active remote participant. The containing appâ€™s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/PushToTalk/PTChannelManagerDelegate] receives this dictionary if the user has joined a push-to-talk channel.

## Receiving local events

- **reportIncomingCall(userInfo:)**: Informs the manager about an incoming call.
